data.name: CreateDbScript
data.value:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Logs]( [LogId] [bigint] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [LogTypeId] [int] NOT NULL, [OrderId] [bigint] NULL, [LogText] [nvarchar](max) NOT NULL, [CreatedOn] [datetime] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Log] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [LogId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[LogTypes]( [LogTypeId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [LogType] [nvarchar](25) NOT NULL, [CreatedOn] [datetime] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_LogTypes] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [LogTypeId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[OSSConfigurations]( [ConfigId] [bigint] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [ConfigKey] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [ConfigValue] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[OssLastSyncOrderDetail]( [LastSynchOrderId] [bigint] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[OSSOrders]( [OSSOrderId] [bigint] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [THubOrderId] [bigint] NOT NULL, [THubOrderReferenceNo] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [CreatedOn] [datetime] NOT NULL, [THubCompleteOrder] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [SentToMB] [bit] NULL, [SentToMBOn] [datetime] NULL, [MBPostShipmentMessage] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [MBPostShipmentResponseMessage] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [MBSuccessfullyReceived] [bit] NULL, [MBShipmentId] [nvarchar](15) NULL, [MBShipmentSubmitError] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [MBShipmentIdSubmitedToThub] [bit] NULL, [MBShipmentIdSubmitedToThubOn] [datetime] NULL, [MBShipmentMethod] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [OrderStatus] [tinyint] NULL, [LastSyncWithMBOn] [datetime] NULL, [THubUpdatedOn] [datetime] NULL, [MBTrackingNumber] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [CancelMessage] [nvarchar](500) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_OSSOrders] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [OSSOrderId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[OSSShipmentMappings]( [OSSShipmentMappingsId] [bigint] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [SourceShipmentMethod] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [DestinationShipmentMethod] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [THubToMBMap] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_OSSShipmentMappings] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [OSSShipmentMappingsId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[OSSOrders] ADD CONSTRAINT [DF_OSSOrders_SentToMB] DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [SentToMB]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[OSSOrders] ADD CONSTRAINT [DF_OSSOrders_MBShipmentIdSubmitedToThub] DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [MBShipmentIdSubmitedToThub] ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Logs] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Logs_LogTypes] FOREIGN KEY([LogTypeId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[LogTypes] ([LogTypeId]) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Logs] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Logs_LogTypes]
CREATE TYPE [dbo].[CreateOSSOrdersTableType] AS TABLE( [THubOrderId] [bigint] NOT NULL, [THubOrderReferenceNo] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [CreatedOn] [datetime] NOT NULL, [THubCompleteOrder] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [OrderStatus] [tinyint] NOT NULL )
/****** Object: UserDefinedTableType [dbo].[OSSOrdersTableType] Script Date: 10/9/2014 12:34:09 PM ******/ CREATE TYPE [dbo].[OSSOrdersTableType] AS TABLE( [THubOrderId] [bigint] NOT NULL, [THubOrderReferenceNo] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [CreatedOn] [datetime] NOT NULL, [THubCompleteOrder] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [SentToMB] [bit] NULL, [SentToMBOn] [datetime] NULL, [MBPostShipmentMessage] [varchar](max) NULL, [MBPostShipmentResponseMessage] [varchar](max) NULL, [MBSuccessfullyReceived] [bit] NULL, [MBShipmentId] [nvarchar](15) NULL, [MBShipmentSubmitError] [nvarchar](max) NULL )

data.name: CreateOssOrders
CreateUSP_LoadOrdersFromStaging
data.value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[USPLoadOrdersFromStaging] @OrderStatus int AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT [OSSOrderId] ,[THubOrderId] ,[THubOrderReferenceNo] ,[CreatedOn] ,[THubCompleteOrder] ,[SentToMB] ,[SentToMBOn] ,[MBPostShipmentMessage] ,[MBPostShipmentResponseMessage] ,[MBSuccessfullyReceived] ,[MBShipmentId] ,[MBShipmentSubmitError] ,[MBShipmentIdSubmitedToThub] ,[MBShipmentIdSubmitedToThubOn] ,[OrderStatus] ,[LastSyncWithMBOn] ,[THubUpdatedOn] ,[MBTrackingNumber] ,[CancelMessage] ,[MBShipmentMethod] FROM [dbo].[OSSOrders] where [OrderStatus] = @OrderStatus END

data.name: CreateUSP_UpdateOrderAfterMoldingBoxShipmentRequest
